author: dsavage
msg: update version of bnd used within sigil

author: stsp
msg: Fix issue #3828, "proplist for base tree should not use the node walker".
This change extends the new (as of r1071283) implementation of
svn proplist -R wc_path to support wc_path@BASE as well.
causes pristine props to be listed if TRUE.
(SVN_WC__VERSION): Bump to 26. Document the changes made in 25 and 26.
STMT_CACHE_NODE_BASE_PROPS_OF_CHILDREN): New queries, based on their
(NODES_BASE): New view. Based on its counterpart NODES_CURRENT.
(STMT_UPGRADE_TO_26): New upgrade statement which creates NODES_BASE.
(cache_props_recursive): Add support for caching BASE props by issuing
the corresponding new queries if BASE props have been requested.
Don't cache props from the ACTUAL_NODE table because they aren't
(svn_wc__upgrade_sdb): Add support for upgrades to format 26.
(svn_client_proplist3): Drop a comment stating that this implementation
was similar to svn_client_propget3(), as this is no longer true.
Stop using the node walker for listing BASE props, and pass the

author: gstein
msg: Some simple transforms in the path parsing function to lay the path for
(pdh_parse_local_abspath): rename WCROOT to PROBE_WCROOT. in the first
blocks of the function, if PDH is found/created, then immediately
LOCAL_DIR_ABSPATH to be the directory that is/contains LOCAL_ABSPATH,
and use it throughout the function.
